property.name: Rules
property.value: All Slivers have banding. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: CARDNAME gets +3/+3 and has flying, first strike, and lifelink as long as you have one or more emblems.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You are a Flagbearer. While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: CARDNAME counts as five creatures for spells and effects that count the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Until end of turn, you may play one basic Plains card from outside the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create three 0/0 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cards in the winning deck(s) of the latest Mythic Championship cost {1} more to cast.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Players can't cast instant spells unless a spell or ability is on the stack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Hounds are Dogs. (We'll errata this to be true.) First strike, lifelink Underdog - If you've lost a game this match, CARDNAME and other Dogs you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature or player gains flying until end of turn. (Players with flying can't be dealt damage by creatures without flying.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or more - • Destroy all small creatures. • Destroy all medium creatures. • Destroy all large creatures. (A small creature has total power and toughness 4 or less, medium is 5-8, and large is 9 or more.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card. Combat damage uses the stack. (Combat damage assignment can be responded to before damage is dealt.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wizened Arbiter enters the battlefield, you may reveal a white card you own from outside the game. If you do, exchange that card with a card in your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target creature you own and control. That creature becomes your Commander. Any other Commanders you have are no longer your Commander. (That creature starts with a commander tax of {0}.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Enchant instant or sorcery spell on the stack When CARDNAME becomes attached to an instant or sorcery, put that card onto the battlefield under its owner's control. It's a creature in addition to its other types with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost. When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, enchanted card's owner sacrifices it unless they cast it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scrycast {0} (If you see this card while scrying, you may reveal it and cast it by paying {0}.) Flying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at target opponent's sideboard. You may cast a card from that sideboard without paying its mana cost. Exile CARDNAME.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Shroud CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of turns you've taken this game. (If this is in your deck, please keep track of your turns. This means you, Mark.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Restart the turn, except with CARDNAME in exile. (First, return all cards to where they were as the turn began. For information from hidden zones like the hand, reconstruct as best you can, and do the rest at random.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature or enchantment Enchanted permanent is an enchantment and loses all other card types. (It still has its abilities, but it's no longer a creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw two cards. You may cast creature cards from your hand as though they were the card Mulldrifter. (You can still evoke this way. They're Mulldrifters.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Buyback {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Flash Flying When you cast this spell, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All lands are Islands in addition to their other types. Other Homarids, Camarids, Cephalids, Nautilids, and Merfolk you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you have a maximum hand size other than 7, CARDNAME has "{T}: Draw a card."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Four-faced (Whenever this becomes tapped, move it to the next stage, or to stage 1 if it's at stage 4.) Stage 1 - (1/4) Stage 2 - (4/1) Evolve Stage 3 - (2/4) {U}: CARDNAME gets +1/-1 until end of turn. Stage 4 - (4/4) Vigilance. {T}: Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card. Bank (If you cast CARDNAME from your hand, exile it until the end of the match. You may cast it from exile during another game this match. It still counts toward your deck minimum.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When CARDNAME dies, put a flying counter on target creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield or that player pays the ransom. Ransom - {6} and 2 life

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target permanent, then put it into its owner's hand. That player discards that card, then puts it on top of their library. Then they put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Take an extra turn after this one. If this card is in your opening hand, you may exile it. If you do, create four Time Walk token cards and shuffle them into your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent chooses one - • Truth - That player plays with their hand revealed for the rest of the game. • Dare - Mill all but the bottom ten cards of that player's library. (To mill, put the top card of that library into its owner's graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creature cards you own with flash are instants in addition to their other types. Whenever you cast another spell with two or more card types, you may draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spark (Activate spark abilities by spending or giving yourself spark counters. Activate only one spark ability per turn, and only as a sorcery.) +1: CARDNAME gains lifelink until end of turn. −3: Target opponent discards a card. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When CARDNAME is put into your graveyard from anywhere, exile it. When you do, create four Reassembling Skeleton token cards and put them into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may begin the game with CARDNAME in your graveyard. If you do, you lose 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black Insect creature tokens. Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may sacrifice an Insect. When you do, curse defending player. (Create a black Aura Curse enchantment token that's attached to that player. It has enchant player and "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying CARDNAME's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1. When CARDNAME dies, target opponent puts a card from their hand on top of their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as CARDNAME is tapped, creatures you control have menace and deathtouch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When CARDNAME dies, two target lands become Swamps. Exile CARDNAME. {3}, {T}: Tap target creature, then return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: CARDNAME can't block. CARDNAME can't die. (This creature has indestructible, can't be sacrificed, and doesn't go to the graveyard for having 0 toughness.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. Choose a nonland card from it. Ransom that card. (Exile it. Its owner may pay {3} at any time to return it to their hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create three Gunk token cards and shuffle them into target opponent's library. (Gunk is a colorless sorcery card with no mana cost that has cycling {4}.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player discards a card, then loses 1 life, then sacrifices an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, a land, a planeswalker, and a tribal permanent, then exiles a card from their graveyard, then puts the top card of their library into their graveyard, then removes a counter from a permanent they control, then gets a poison counter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Spellmorph {B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Cast it any time for its spellmorph cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reverse miracle {B} (If this card is on the bottom of your library as you begin searching it, you may cast it by paying its reverse miracle cost.) Exile all creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever CARDNAME attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each Locus you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with ten eyestalk counters on it. If CARDNAME would be dealt damage, remove that many eyestalk counters from it instead. If you can't, sacrifice it. Whenever CARDNAME attacks, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an instant, sorcery, or enchantment card with converted mana cost less than the number of eyestalk counters on CARDNAME. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Shuffle your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if your starting library had at least 13 cards over the minimum, search your library for a card and put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library. Otherwise, CARDNAME deals 4 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When CARDNAME deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card unless they challenge you. If challenged, and you show them two black cards in your hand, they must discard two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, you may play face-up cards you own from exile. If a card would be put into your graveyard or exile from anywhere this turn, put it on the bottom of your library instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, cards you own that aren't on the battlefield lose all card types, costs, names, and abilities and become red sorceries named Missile that cost {R} with "Missile deals 2 damage to any target."

property.name: Rules
property.value: All targeted spells and abilities cost {2} less and have their targets chosen randomly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If CARDNAME is in your opening hand and you're not the starting player, you may reveal it. If you do, you become the starting player. Haste

property.name: Rules
property.value: Motivate {3}{R} (This creature can't attack or block unless you have paid its motivate cost once. Motivate only as a sorcery.) When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a player would add mana, instead all players add that mana.

property.name: Rules
property.value: CARDNAME deals X damage to each creature without flying and each planeswalker. If X is 10 or more, open the "Uncovered Cavern" plot booster.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to any target. Then, starting with you, each player assigns their creatures to the left or right of the volcano. Creatures enter the battlefield to the left or right of the volcano. Creatures can't block creatures on the other side of the volcano.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste The stack is now first in, first out instead of last in, first out. (The first spell or ability on the stack is the first one to resolve.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}: Exchange CARDNAME from your hand with a permanent you control on the battlefield or a spell you control on the stack. If that permanent or spell was the target of a spell or ability, change that target to CARDNAME.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tasty (This creature can be attacked directly. If it is attacked, it can't block creatures that didn't attack it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Untapped creatures can't block. Tapped creatures can block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast CARDNAME during an opponent's combat phase. Firstest strike (This creature deals combat damage to creatures before creatures with first strike.) After each opponent's first combat phase of each turn, there is an additional combat phase. Only CARDNAME can attack during that combat phase.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Cast a copy of one of the following cards chosen at random - Ignorant Bliss, Crack the Earth, Blazing Volley. −3: Cast a copy of one of the following cards chosen at random - Seething Song, Dance with Devils, Flamebreak. −6: Cast a copy of one of the following cards chosen at random - Hellion Eruption, Insurrection, Warp World.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target instant or sorcery spell becomes a copy of Lightning Bolt. Its controller may choose new targets for it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever CARDNAME is countered or fizzles, you may copy it and choose new targets for the copy. CARDNAME deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each end step, you may have CARDNAME's base power and toughness each become equal to the greatest number of spells and abilities from different sources that were on the stack simultaneously that turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle your whammy deck, then reveal cards from the top of your whammy deck until you reveal an Island or choose to stop. Then, if no Islands were revealed this way, CARDNAME deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of cards revealed. (A whammy deck consists of a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Aggressive (During your turn, there is an additional combat phase after the first, and only creatures with aggressive may attack during it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with a token copy of Pacifism attached to it.

property.value: {1}{Z}: Put a +1/+2 counter on CARDNAME. ({Z} is paid with one mana from any source that could produce two or more colors of mana.)

property.value: Protection from enemy-colored multicolored. (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything that's two enemy colors, such as blue and green.)

property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a Forest land token.

property.value: Create a 2/2 green Gorilla creature token. When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard CARDNAME, create two 2/2 green Gorilla creature tokens.

Vigilance, haste Whenever a player attacks with a creature with power 4 or greater, CARDNAME also attacks the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.

property.value: Enchant creature Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies. The copies enter the battlefield as tokens.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has vigilance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double any effect that doubles. (It quadruples.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if you didn't go first this game.

property.value: Landship - At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it's a land, you may reveal it. If you do, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token. Kinfall - Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it shares a creature type with CARDNAME, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.value: Megalegendary (Your deck can have only one copy of this card.) Vigilance, trample CARDNAME has the activated abilities of all other permanents on the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spells and abilities you control can't destroy, exile, target, or cause you to sacrifice CARDNAME. At the beginning of your upkeep, double your life total. Then, if you have 1,000 or more life, you lose the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become Abian. (Your life total becomes equal to their loyalty. You can activate the loyalty abilities by spending or gaining life.) [+3]: Discard your hand, then draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control. [+1]: Create a 3/2 red and green Spirit creature token. −X: You deal X damage to any target.

property.value: Whenever you cast a spell of a type showing on CARDNAME, put a counter over that type and draw a card. If all five types on CARDNAME have counters over them, sacrifice it and draw one more card. BOX artifact BOX creature BOX enchantment BOX instant BOX sorcery

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one at random - • You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, pay {U}{B}{R}. If you don't, you lose the game." • Each player discards their hand. • Planeswalk to Pools of Becoming. (Once there, you can roll the planar die only if you're playing Planechase.) • For each opponent, exile cards from the top of their library until you exile a nonland card. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs. • Destroy all creatures and non-Bolas planeswalkers. • You get an emblem with "You can cast nonland cards from your sideboard."
